question: You recently bought a camera while travelling overseas. When you got to your destination you discovered that some important items were missing from the box.Write a letter to the local representative of the company. In your lettergive details of the camera and where you bought itexplain what has happenedsay what you want him/her to do about it
text: I am writing to express my extreme disappointment with a recent purchase of a Canon 5D camera from your outlet in Kuala Lumpur, on the 20th of April 2020, which was missing its charger from the box.

The purchase was for a long-planned family vacation to Thailand. We discovered a missing item only after reaching our destination. Due to a hurried purchase, we did not unbox it then and there, which has caused this turmoil. I have attached a receipt for your perusal.

Since it is urgent and important that we use the device, I suggest that you may please organize a collection of the charger from your outlet in Thailand. There is one nearby our stay, in Patong, which would be convenient for me. And, it would be really appreciated if this can be arranged for tomorrow since our vacation ends by the end of this week.
I hope you consider this suggestion and organize the same accordingly.
